channel.title: Help With My Hamchi Server!Admin Spot To Who Helps Best!
channel.description:
Hi i have a server thats up and im the owner of it but it's on testscape sorce and it says other people are mod/admins but im the owner i know you have to change some file but what one is it if some body can post some pics and ill also need some pics of how to put in commands and how do i change npc like move them the person whos make a good post that really help gets *Admin Spot* but show me how lol X[) well please get those pics threw and ill see you as an admin =]
This is My sorce folder how do i make my self admin/change npcs/insert commands like for admin's ::master.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/4687/testscapesorceug5.png[/img][/URL]
And here is the pic that im playing see down the bottom it says other people and im not admin :confused:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/6699/moparnj2.png[/img][/URL]
